mapper.select: select ${seq} from dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT (ID, NICKNAME, TRADE_ACOUNT, TRADE_PASSWORD, ASSET_ID, FUND_ACCOUNT, COMBINE_NAME, CLIENT_NAME, ASSETUNIT_NAME, COMBIE_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{combineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetunitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{combineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STOCK_RULE
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_STOCK_FUND_FLOW_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_FUND_FLOW (ID, NICKNAME,TRANSACTION_TYPE, FUND, TRANSACTION_TIME, DECRIPTION) VALUES (#{id},#{nickname} ,#{transactionType}, #{fund}, SYSDATE, #{desc})
mapper.update:
UPDATE STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO W SET W.MANAGEMENT_FEE = W.MANAGEMENT_FEE + (SELECT R.FEE_RADIO * W.TRADE_FUND FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = W.NICKNAME), W.ADD_MANAGEMENT_FEE = (SELECT R.FEE_RADIO * W.TRADE_FUND FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = W.NICKNAME), W.DRAW_FEE = (SELECT R.FEE_RADIO * W.TRADE_FUND * R.UP_LINE_PERCENT FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = W.NICKNAME AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE R.USER_ID = U.ID AND U.REFEREE_ID IS NOT NULL)) WHERE W.IS_CURRENT = '1'
And To_Char(w.Start_Date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:ss') <= To_Char(Sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd ') || #{chargeFeeDate} And To_Char(w.Start_Date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:ss') > To_Char(Sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 08:45:00'

UPDATE STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO W SET W.MANAGEMENT_FEE = W.MANAGEMENT_FEE + (SELECT R.FEE_RADIO * W.TRADE_FUND FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = W.NICKNAME), W.ADD_MANAGEMENT_FEE = (SELECT R.FEE_RADIO * W.TRADE_FUND FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = W.NICKNAME), W.DRAW_FEE = (SELECT R.FEE_RADIO * W.TRADE_FUND * R.UP_LINE_PERCENT FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = W.NICKNAME AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE R.USER_ID = U.ID AND U.REFEREE_ID IS NOT NULL)) WHERE W.IS_CURRENT = '1' And W.nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select:
SELECT S.NICKNAME,S.ADD_MANAGEMENT_FEE,S.DRAW_FEE FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO S WHERE S.IS_CURRENT = '1'
And To_Char(s.Start_Date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:ss') <= To_Char(Sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd ') || #{chargeFeeDate} And To_Char(s.Start_Date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:ss') > To_Char(Sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || ' 08:45:00'
SELECT S.NICKNAME,S.ADD_MANAGEMENT_FEE,S.DRAW_FEE FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO S WHERE S.IS_CURRENT = '1' And s.nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_STOCK_FUND_FLOW_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_FUND_FLOW (ID, NICKNAME,TRANSACTION_TYPE, FUND, TRANSACTION_TIME, DECRIPTION) VALUES (#{id},#{nickname} ,#{transactionType}, #{fund}, SYSDATE, #{desc})
mapper.update: UPDATE STOCK_USER_WALLET W SET W.BALANCE = (W.BALANCE + #{fund,jdbcType=FLOAT}) WHERE W.NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT (O.GUARANTEE_CASH + #{addGuranteeCash}) GUARANTEE_CASH, (CASE WHEN O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH < 0 AND (#{addGuranteeCash}+O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH)>0 THEN (O.GUARANTEE_CASH + #{addGuranteeCash}+O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH) WHEN O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH < 0 AND (#{addGuranteeCash}+O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH) <= 0 THEN O.GUARANTEE_CASH WHEN O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH >= 0 THEN O.GUARANTEE_CASH + #{addGuranteeCash} END) CURRENT_GUARANTEE_CASH,
( (O.GUARANTEE_CASH + #{addGuranteeCash}) *(SELECT R.ASSIGN_RADIO FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE O.NICKNAME = R.NICKNAME) ) ORGIN_OPERATE_LIMIT,
(CASE WHEN O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH < 0 AND (#{addGuranteeCash}+O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH)>0 THEN (O.GUARANTEE_CASH + #{addGuranteeCash}+O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH) *(SELECT R.ASSIGN_RADIO FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE O.NICKNAME = R.NICKNAME) WHEN O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH < 0 AND (#{addGuranteeCash}+O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH) <= 0 THEN O.TRADE_FUND WHEN O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH >= 0 THEN (O.GUARANTEE_CASH + #{addGuranteeCash})*(SELECT R.ASSIGN_RADIO FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE O.NICKNAME = R.NICKNAME) END) CURRENT_OPERATE_LIMIT , O.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH, (select r.ASSIGN_RADIO from STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO r where r.NICKNAME = O.NICKNAME)ASSIGN_RADIO, O.STOP_CASH, O.WARN_CASH, (Select r.stop_radio From Stock_Fund_Assign_Radio r Where r.nickname = O.NICKNAME) Stop_Radio, (Select r.warn_radio From Stock_Fund_Assign_Radio r Where r.nickname = O.NICKNAME) Warn_Radio, (Select r.assign_cash From Stock_Fund_Assign_Radio r Where r.nickname = O.NICKNAME) assign_cash, (Select r.fee_radio From Stock_Fund_Assign_Radio r Where r.nickname = O.NICKNAME) fee_radio, (SELECT A.FUND_ACCOUNT FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT A WHERE A.IS_CURRENT = '1' AND A.ID = O.OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID) FUND_ACCOUNT, (Select m.combine_id From Stock_Manager_Acount m Where m.Fund_Account = (Select a.Fund_Account From Stock_User_Operate_Acount a Where a.Is_Current = '1' And a.Id = O.OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID)) MANAGER_COMBINE_ID FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO O WHERE O.NICKNAME = #{nickname} and o.IS_CURRENT = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M SET TRADE_FUND = to_number(#{currentOperateLimit}), GUARANTEE_CASH = to_number(#{currentGuaranteeCash}), PROFIT_LOSS_CASH = to_number(#{profitAndLossCash}), STOP_CASH = to_number(#{currentOperateLimit})*(select radio.STOP_RADIO from STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO radio where radio.nickname = m.nickname), WARN_CASH = to_number(#{currentOperateLimit})*(select radio.WARN_RADIO from STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO radio where radio.nickname = m.nickname), PROFIT_LOSS_RADIO = to_number(#{profitAndLossCash})/to_number(#{currentGuaranteeCash}), CURRENT_ASSET = to_number(#{currentGuaranteeCash})+to_number(#{profitAndLossCash}), ACTUAL_CASH = ACTUAL_CASH + to_number(#{addedAssginCapital}) WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname} and IS_CURRENT = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT (M.TRADE_FUND - M.ACTUAL_CASH) NEEDWANTCASH, NICKNAME FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.ACTUAL_CASH = M.WARN_CASH AND M.IS_CURRENT = '1' AND M.AUTO_ADD_GUARANTEE_CASH = 'Y'
SELECT TRADE_FUND FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname} and IS_CURRENT = '1'
mapper.update: update STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO set AUTO_ADD_GUARANTEE_CASH ='Y' WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname} and IS_CURRENT = '1'
mapper.select: select 1 from STOCK_USER_WALLET w where w.nickname = #{nickname} and w.BALANCE > to_number(#{addGuaranteeCash})
mapper.update: update STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO set IS_CURRENT = '0',END_DATE = sysdate ,STOP_BUY='0' where nickname = #{nickname} and IS_CURRENT = '1'

Update Stock_User_Acount_Assigned a Set a.Flag = '0' , a.LAST_USE_DATE = sysdate Where Exists (Select 1 From Stock_User_Operate_Acount o Where o.Trade_Acount = a.Operator_Acount And o.Nickname = #{nickname} And o.Is_Current = '1') And a.Flag = '1'
update stock_user_operate_acount set IS_CURRENT = '0' where nickname = #{nickname} and IS_CURRENT = '1'

Update Stock_User_Operate_Maininfo o Set o.Assign_Referee_Cash = (Select (nvl(Trunc(To_Date(To_Char(m.End_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - To_Date(To_Char(m.Start_Date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')),0) * (Select p.Assign_Referee_Draw_Percent From Stock_Fund_Assign_Radio p Where p.Nickname = m.Nickname)) Income From Stock_User_Operate_Maininfo m Where m.Is_Current = '1' And Exists (Select 1 From Stock_User u Where u.Nickname = m.Nickname And u.Referee_Id Is Not Null) And m.Nickname = o.Nickname) where o.nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: SELECT S.ID, S.CURRENT_ASSET, S.ACTUAL_CASH, S.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH, S.PROFIT_LOSS_RADIO * 100 PROFIT_LOSS_RADIO, S.MANAGEMENT_FEE, S.GUARANTEE_CASH, S.TICKET ASSET_ID, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ENDDATE, (SELECT R.LOAN_RULE FROM STOCK_RULE R) LOAN_RULE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T.END_DATE desc) AS NUM, T.* FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO T WHERE T.NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND T.IS_CURRENT = '0') S WHERE NUM > = #{offset} + 1 AND NUM <= #{offset} + 20
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_DEPOSIT_RECORD_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO DEPOSIT_RECORD (ID, NICKNAME,PAY_ACCOUNT, FUND, PAY_DATE) VALUES (#{id},#{nickname} ,#{payAccount}, #{fund}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, M.CURRENT_CASH, M.TICKET ASSET_ID, (SELECT R.STOP_RADIO * 100 || '%' FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = M.NICKNAME) STOP_RADIO FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND M.UNACTIVE_END = '1' AND M.IS_CURRENT = '1' AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY M.END_DATE DESC
mapper.update: MERGE INTO STOCK_FEE_CALENDAR P USING (SELECT #{feeDate} FEE_DATE, #{yearMonth} YEAR_MONTH, #{day} DAY FROM DUAL) T ON (trim(P.FEE_DATE) = trim(T.FEE_DATE)) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P.FLAG = '1' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (P.FEE_DATE, P.YEAR_MONTH, P.DAY) VALUES (T.FEE_DATE, T.YEAR_MONTH, T.DAY)
update STOCK_FEE_CALENDAR set flag='0' where FEE_DATE = #{feeDate} and YEAR_MONTH=#{yearMonth} and DAY = #{day}
mapper.select: Select trim(m.Day) From Stock_Fee_Calendar m Where M.Year_Month = #{month} AND m.Flag = '1' Order By m.Fee_Date
Select 1 From Stock_Fee_Calendar m Where trim(M.Fee_Date) = #{feeDate} and m.FLAG='1'

SELECT M.ID, M.NICKNAME, M.ACTUAL_CASH, M.WARN_CASH, M.TICKET, M.STOP_CASH, (SELECT U.TELEPHONE FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = M.NICKNAME) PHONE FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.IS_CURRENT = '1' AND M.ACTUAL_CASH <= M.WARN_CASH AND M.WARN_FLAG = '0'

SELECT M.NICKNAME,M.ID, M.ACTUAL_CASH, M.WARN_CASH, (SELECT TRADE_ACOUNT FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT A WHERE A.ID = M.OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID AND A.IS_CURRENT = '1') TRADE_ACOUNT, M.STOP_BUY FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.IS_CURRENT = '1'
mapper.update: update STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO set STOP_BUY = #{flag} where id = #{operateId}
update STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO set WARN_FLAG = '1' where id = #{operateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M SET M.WARN_FLAG = '0' WHERE M.ID IN (SELECT M.ID FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.IS_CURRENT = '1' AND (SELECT ((1 - R.WARN_RADIO) * #{swingPercent} + R.WARN_RADIO) * M.TRADE_FUND FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.NICKNAME = M.NICKNAME) < M.ACTUAL_CASH AND M.WARN_FLAG = '1')
mapper.select: Select (Case When w.Debt = 0 Then '' Else w.Debt||'' End) Debt, (Select 1 From Stock_User_Operate_Maininfo m Where m.Is_Current = '1' And m.Nickname = w.Nickname) operation, w.balance From Stock_User_Wallet w Where w.Nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_TRANSACTION_INFO_ID.Nextval from dual
MERGE INTO STOCK_TRANSACTION_INFO P USING (SELECT #{id} ID, #{userId} USER_ID, #{nickname} NICKNAME, #{merchantId} MERCHANT_ID, #{cash} CASH, #{status} STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, #{respMsg} DESCRIPTION, #{merchantDate} TRANSACTION_TIME, #{refNo} REF_NO FROM DUAL) T ON (TRIM(P.MERCHANT_ID) = TRIM(T.MERCHANT_ID) and p.USER_ID = t.USER_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P.TRANSACTION_TIME = T.TRANSACTION_TIME,P.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION = T.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (P.ID, P.MERCHANT_ID, P.USER_ID, P.NICKNAME,P.CASH, P.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, P.TRANSACTION_TIME, P.DESCRIPTION, P.REF_NO) VALUES (T.ID, T.MERCHANT_ID, T.USER_ID, T.NICKNAME,T.CASH, T.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, T.TRANSACTION_TIME, T.DESCRIPTION, T.REF_NO)

select SEQ_TRANSACTION_INFO_ID.Nextval from dual
MERGE INTO STOCK_TRANSACTION_INFO P USING (SELECT #{id} ID, #{userId} USER_ID, #{nickname} NICKNAME, #{merchantId} MERCHANT_ID, #{cash} CASH, #{respMsg} DESCRIPTION, sysdate ACCEPT_TIME, #{acceptStatus} STATUS_ACCEPT, #{bankName} bankName, #{refNo} REF_NO FROM DUAL) T ON (TRIM(P.MERCHANT_ID) = TRIM(T.MERCHANT_ID) and p.USER_ID = t.USER_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P.ACCEPT_TIME = T.ACCEPT_TIME,P.STATUS_ACCEPT = T.STATUS_ACCEPT,P.bankName = T.bankName,P.DESCRIPTION = T.DESCRIPTION WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (P.ID, P.MERCHANT_ID, P.USER_ID, P.NICKNAME, P.STATUS_ACCEPT, P.ACCEPT_TIME, P.DESCRIPTION,P.bankName,P.REF_NO) VALUES (T.ID, T.MERCHANT_ID, T.USER_ID, T.NICKNAME, T.STATUS_ACCEPT, T.ACCEPT_TIME, T.DESCRIPTION,T.bankName,T.REF_NO)

select SEQ_TRANSACTION_INFO_ID.Nextval from dual
MERGE INTO STOCK_TRANSACTION_INFO P USING (SELECT #{id} ID, #{userId} USER_ID, #{nickname} NICKNAME, #{merchantId} MERCHANT_ID, #{amount} CASH, #{rechargeResult} STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, #{responseResult} DESCRIPTION, #{merchantDate} TRANSACTION_TIME FROM DUAL) T ON (TRIM(P.MERCHANT_ID) = TRIM(T.MERCHANT_ID) and p.USER_ID = t.USER_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P.TRANSACTION_TIME = T.TRANSACTION_TIME,P.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION = T.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, P.STATUS_ACCEPT = T.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION,P.DESCRIPTION = T.DESCRIPTION WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (P.ID, P.MERCHANT_ID, P.USER_ID, P.NICKNAME, P.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, P.STATUS_ACCEPT, P.TRANSACTION_TIME, P.DESCRIPTION) VALUES (T.ID, T.MERCHANT_ID, T.USER_ID, T.NICKNAME, T.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, T.STATUS_APP_TRANSACTION, T.TRANSACTION_TIME, T.DESCRIPTION)

select SEQ_STOCK_DICTIONARIES_ID.Nextval from dual
insert into stock_dictionaries(id,DIC_TYPE,dic_Word,dic_Value,dic_Name,Order_No,DES,IS_CACHE,Status) values(SEQ_STOCK_DICTIONARIES_ID.Nextval,#{dicType},#{dicWord},#{dicValue},#{dicName},#{orderNo},#{des},#{isCache},#{status})
mapper.select:
select ID,DIC_TYPE,dic_Word,dic_Value,dic_Name,Order_No,DES,IS_CACHE,Status from stock_dictionaries
dic_Name=#{dicName} and
dic_Word=#{dicWord} and
DIC_TYPE=#{dicType}

select count(id) from stock_dictionaries
dic_Name=#{dicName} and
dic_Word=#{dicWord} and
DIC_TYPE=#{dicType}
mapper.update: update stock_dictionaries set dic_type= #{dicType} , dic_word= #{dicWord} , dic_value =#{dicValue} , dic_name =#{dicName} , order_no =#{orderNo} , des =#{des} , is_cache = #{isCache} , status =#{status} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select ID,DIC_TYPE,dic_Word,dic_Value,dic_Name,Order_No,DES,IS_CACHE,Status from stock_dictionaries where id=#{id}
select ID,DIC_TYPE,dic_Word,dic_Value,dic_Name,Order_No,DES,IS_CACHE,Status from stock_dictionaries where status=1 and dic_Word=#{dicWord}

select ID,DIC_TYPE,dic_Word,dic_Value,dic_Name,Order_No,DES,IS_CACHE,Status from stock_dictionaries
DIC_TYPE=#{dicType} and
dic_Name=#{dicName} and
dic_Word=#{dicWord} and
status=#{status}
order by Order_No asc
